summary_gpt: KEI Industries Limited has confirmed that it was not classified as a Large Corporate under SEBI circular for the financial year 2024-25, with no outstanding borrowings or incremental borrowings during the year. The company's credit rating remains strong at CARE AA+.

KEI Industries Limited has confirmed that it was not classified as a Large Corporate under SEBI circular for the financial year 2024-25, with no borrowings or debt issuance during the period. The company's credit rating remains strong at CARE AA+.

KEI Industries Limited has scheduled a conference call with analysts and institutional investors on May 7, 2025, to discuss its Q4 FY25 financial results, with key management participating. The event aims to provide insights into the company's recent performance and future outlook.
